DOC.brief_summary: To compare analgesic efficacy , safety , tolerability valdecoxib versus piroxicam subject moderate severe menstrual cramping pain associate primary dysmenorrhea .
DOC.brief_title: A Double Blind , Double Dummy , Randomized , Comparative Study Of The Efficacy And Safety Of Valdecoxib 40 Mg Twice Daily , As Needed In The First Menstrual Cycle Day And Then Once A Day , And Piroxicam 40 Mg Once A Day In The Treatment Of Patients With Primary Dysmenorrhea
DOC.criteria: History primary dysmenorrhea moderate severe menstrual cramping pain patient take analgesic medication least three six previous menstrual cycle enrollment Subjects good health complete physical exam ( include pap smear endovaginal pelvic ultrasound , unless subject examination perform within 6 month prior Screening Visit result normal ) prior inclusion Subjects pregnant , lactating , breastfeed use adequate method birth control
